page.title: 18SACREWELL FARM 1
page.content:
{CROPS The farm is an arable farm which specializes in winter wheat. Since wheat can only be grown for about three years running in the same field, break crops of potatoes, sugar beet, peas or grass are grown every fourth year to allow the soil to recover. Crop specialization allows mmore efficient management of the farm.
{CONSERVATION { }The farm has a Site of Special Scientific Interest which contains some rare water plants. Trees have been planted in many places on the farm to screen buildings and improve views. Many trees have been planted on the farm boundary adjacent to the A1. There is a watermill on the farm which can be seen working and many old farm implements have been preserved.
